name: Kick-It-VR! A 3D Football VR Game
description:
Kick-It-VR is a 3D Football VR Game for headsets , cardboards. Enjoy the 3D and 360 experience.

Welcome Kickerfriend! In this virtual reality (vr) game you are a football player in the 360 degree stadion, try to swat the balls into the goals!
Set up your cardboard/Gear VR Glass and enjoy the 3D amazing arcade football game Kick-It-VR.

Get a VR (virtual reality) 3D feeling and play with your friends against the HighScore.
Who can shot the most goals and get the highest level, find it out!

Easy control with your head, no more equipment is required, you can also play this football game without a Gear VR / cardboard.

Features:
- 3D physic engine
- Automatic ball kick
- Bonuslevel
- Head-Control with smartphone gyroscope
- Local HighScore
- Change Player in VR Modus (phone can stay in holder)
- switch Antialiasing
- playable without a cardboard
